# Google Sheets Web App Project

## Project Overview
This is a Next.js TypeScript web application that integrates with Google Sheets using service account authentication. The app uses TanStack Table for data display and Tailwind CSS for styling.

## Technology Stack
- Next.js 14+ with TypeScript
- Tailwind CSS for styling
- TanStack Table for data tables
- Google Sheets API with service account
- Vercel for deployment

## Development Guidelines
- Use TypeScript strict mode
- Follow Next.js 14+ app router conventions
- Implement responsive design with Tailwind CSS
- Use component-based architecture for CSS maintenance
- Follow Google Sheets API best practices
- Implement proper error handling and loading states

## Code Standards
- Use functional components with hooks
- Implement proper TypeScript interfaces
- Use async/await for API calls
- Follow ESLint and Prettier configurations
- Use descriptive component and variable names

## Deployment
- Environment variables configured for Vercel
- GitHub integration for automatic deployments
- Service account credentials securely stored
